project.name: |-- 008-stream-operations-practice-traders
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
TradersRunner: The scenario consists in a system in which traders execute transactions. You're asked to find answers to the following queries: 1. Find all the transactions in the year 2011 and sort them by value (asc) 2. What are all the unique cities where the traders work? 3. Find all traders from Cambridge and sort them by name 4. Return a string of all traders' names sorted alphabetically 5. Are any traders based in Milan? 6. Print all transactions' values from the traders living in Cambridge 7. What's the highest value of all the transactions 8. Find the transaction with the smallest value
